alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 02 at 3:59PM CST until January 02 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES...SOUTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND NORTHWESTERN WINN PARISHES... At 359 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Campti, or 10 miles north of Natchitoches, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Natchitoches, southeastern Bienville and northwestern Winn Parishes, including the following locations... Goldonna, Black Lake, Grand Ecore, Chestnut, Clear Lake, Saline, Creston, Clarence, Lucky and Ashland. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
